name: block_stream2
desc: A stream of blocks.  Write data into it, and it'll output data in buffer blocks the size you specify, padding with zeroes if necessary.

name: through2
desc: A tiny wrapper around Node.js streams.Transform (Streams2/3) to avoid explicit subclassing noise

name: buffer_crc32
desc: crc32 that works with binary data and fancy character sets, outputs buffer, signed or unsigned data and has tests.  Derived from the sample CRC implementation in the PNG specification: http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#D-CRCAppendix
